statements: SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_id = 456;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 5000
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY total_amount ASC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_orders DESC
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM shipping ORDER BY shipping_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, shipping_address FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'shipped';
SELECT order_id, shipping_date, shipping_status FROM shipping WHERE estimated_delivery_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE customer_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT order_date, order_status FROM orders WHERE shipping_address LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT shipping_id, shipping_date, shipping_status FROM shipping WHERE shipping_status = 'In Transit';
SELECT * FROM orders INNER JOIN shipping ON orders.order_id = shipping.order_id;
SELECT order_id, shipping_address, shipping_status FROM orders LEFT JOIN shipping ON orders.order_id = shipping.order_id;
SELECT * FROM orders
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-01'
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE customer_id IN (101, 102, 103) ORDER BY customer_id, total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 5000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_order_amount FROM orders GROUP BY order_id;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM order_items WHERE quantity >= 5 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id WHERE orders.customer_id = 1
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT products.product_name, unit_price, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products JOIN order_items ON products.product_id = order_items.product_id GROUP BY products.product_name, unit_price
SELECT order_id, shipment_date FROM orders JOIN shipment ON orders.order_id = shipment.order_id ORDER BY shipment_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 2
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM order_items WHERE order_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC, total_amount ASC LIMIT 10

SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.order_date, products.product_name FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id WHERE customers.customer_id = 1
SELECT order_id, SUM(price * quantity) AS total_value FROM order_items JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id GROUP BY order_id HAVING total_value > 1000
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date = CURRENT_DATE

SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.order_date, shipments.shipping_address FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN shipments ON orders.order_id = shipments.order_id ORDER BY orders.order_date
